tool_description: WhatsApp Private API is an unofficial API that allows developers to access WhatsApp's messaging platform outside of the official WhatsApp application. This API is not supported or endorsed by WhatsApp and its use violates WhatsApp's terms of service.  The WhatsApp Private API provides developers with a way to interact with WhatsApp's messaging platform, allowing them to automate tasks, send and receive messages, and manage contacts. However, due to the unofficial nature of the API, there is a...
name: Whatsapp Private API
title: Whatsapp Private API

api_list.description: API for get list account under the projects
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-private-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/accounts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-private-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-private-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/accounts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
